author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Avic International Holding (Hk) Ltd Sees Decrease Of About 50 Pct In FY Loss Before Tax
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Avic International Holding (Hk) Ltd :
* SEES REVENUE FROM PROPERTY DEVELOPMENT & INVESTMENT BUSINESS FOR FY 2017 OF ABOUT HK$1.5 BILLION
* GROUP IS EXPECTED TO RECORD GROSS LOSS OF ABOUT HK$200 MILLION FOR FY 2017
* GROUP SEES DECREASE OF ABOUT 50% IN LOSS BEFORE TAX FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* EXPECTED ‍IMPROVEMENT IN LOSS POSITION DUE TO DECREASE IN LOSSES OF CERTAIN INVESTMENTS HELD BY GROUP​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
